title: [SOLVED]iMac 27" 2011
message:
replaced the gpu. now i get a large grey bar. takes about 10 min to boot up. tried putting old gpu back in, same issue. what did i do? (btw osx is 10.6.8 so there should not be a grey bar during bootup)  also tried pram reset.

[URL]https://imgur.com/a/doW6Z[/URL]

title: [SOLVED]iMac 27" 2011
message: Is it doing an EFI update?

title: [SOLVED]iMac 27" 2011
message: Is it the original spindle driver? If so, did you try a different HDD?

title: [SOLVED]iMac 27" 2011
message: Simple corrupted OSX. Use diskwarrior to see if it can repair it. Else backup and reinstall.

title: [SOLVED]iMac 27" 2011
message: thanks duke.  you the best as always.  diskwarrior to the rescue.
